price: ߊ߲ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߟߌ߫ ߞߎ߬ߙߎ ߞߌߣߌ߲ߓߟߏ߫ ߝߘߎ ߝߍ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߡߊߘߏ߲߬ ߢߐ߲߯ߦߋ߫ ߞߊߡߊ߬
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
